data.lyric:
[ti:Little Saint Nick (Stereo Single Version/ Remastered)]
[ar:The Beach Boys]
[al:Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Little Saint Nick (Stereo Single Version/ Remastered) - The Beach Boys
[00:02.06]Composed by：Brian Wilson/Mike Love
[00:05.00]Ooh
[00:06.75]Merry Christmas Saint Nick
[00:09.03]Christmas comes this time each year
[00:11.87]Ooh ooh
[00:15.19]Well way up North where the air gets cold
[00:18.47]There's a tale about Christmas
[00:20.47]That you've all been told
[00:22.11]And a real famous cat all dressed up in red
[00:25.73]And he spends the whole year workin' out on his sled
[00:29.35]It's the little Saint Nick little Saint Nick
[00:33.10]It's the little Saint Nick little Saint Nick
[00:36.89]Just a little bobsled we call the old Saint Nick
[00:40.35]But she'll walk a toboggan with a four speed stick
[00:43.61]
[00:44.37]She's candy apple red with a ski for a wheel
[00:47.86]And when Santa hits the gas man just watch her peel
[00:51.25]It's the little Saint Nick little Saint Nick
[00:54.91]It's the little Saint Nick little Saint Nick
[00:58.93]Run run reindeer
[01:02.76]Run run reindeer whoa
[01:06.43]Run run reindeer
[01:10.07]Run run reindeer he don't miss no one
[01:13.67]And haulin' through the snow at a frightening speed
[01:16.91]With a half a dozen deer with Rudy to lead
[01:20.11]
[01:21.03]He's got to wear his goggles 'cause the snow really flies
[01:24.23]And he's cruisin' every path with a little surprise
[01:28.03]It's the little Saint Nick little Saint Nick
[01:31.64]It's the little Saint Nick little Saint Nick
[01:35.80]Ooh
[01:37.90]Merry Christmas Saint Nick
[01:40.40]Christmas comes this time each year
[01:43.10]Ooh
[01:45.34]Merry Christmas Saint Nick
[01:47.58]Christmas comes this time each year
[01:50.30]Ooh
[01:52.74]Merry Christmas Saint Nick
[01:54.86]Christmas comes this time each year
data.trans:
[ti:Little Saint Nick (Stereo Single Version/ Remastered)]
[ar:The Beach Boys]
[al:Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:02.06]//
[00:05.00]//
[00:06.75]圣诞快乐圣人尼克
[00:09.03]每年这个时候圣诞节就要来了
[00:11.87]//
[00:15.19]在遥远的北方那里的空气很冷
[00:18.47]有一个关于圣诞节的传说
[00:20.47]大家都知道
[00:22.11]还有一只穿着红色衣服的猫
[00:25.73]他一整年都在练习滑雪
[00:29.35]这是圣人尼克
[00:33.10]这是圣人尼克
[00:36.89]一架小型雪橇我们称之为圣尼克
[00:40.35]但她会拿着四速变速杆走摩托车
[00:43.61]
[00:44.37]她就像糖果苹果红色的滑雪板
[00:47.86]当圣诞老人踩下油门看着她离开
[00:51.25]这是圣人尼克
[00:54.91]这是圣人尼克
[00:58.93]奔跑吧驯鹿
[01:02.76]奔跑吧驯鹿
[01:06.43]奔跑吧驯鹿
[01:10.07]奔跑吧驯鹿他谁都不想念
[01:13.67]以令人恐惧的速度在雪地里穿梭
[01:16.91]带着六只鹿还有Rudy带领
[01:20.11]
[01:21.03]他得戴上护目镜因为大雪纷飞
[01:24.23]他在每一条路上都带着一丝惊喜
[01:28.03]这是圣人尼克
[01:31.64]这是圣人尼克
[01:35.80]//
[01:37.90]圣诞快乐圣人尼克
[01:40.40]每年这个时候圣诞节就要来了
[01:43.10]//
[01:45.34]圣诞快乐圣人尼克
[01:47.58]每年这个时候圣诞节就要来了
[01:50.30]//
[01:52.74]圣诞快乐圣人尼克
[01:54.86]每年这个时候圣诞节就要来了
